titles.title: Transparent Recognition of Unjustified Tax Hoarding in Government Act of 2016
TRUTH in Government Act of 2016
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the withholding of income and social security taxes.
TRUTH in Government Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Transparent Recognition of Unjustified Tax Hoarding in Government Act of 2016 or the TRUTH in Government Act of 2016
This bill repeals provisions of the Internal Revenue Code requiring the withholding of income, Social Security, and railroad retirement taxes from wages.
